text: Didier Mathus Didier Mathus (born May 25, 1952 in Montceau-les-Mines) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Saône-et-Loire department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Montceau-les-Mines Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Didier Mathus
